directions: In a large saucepan over medium heat, melt butter.  Cook onions and celery in butter 3 minutes.  Whisk in flour and cook 6 minutes more, until light brown.  Whisk in broth and simmer 10 minutes.
Stir in creamed corn, corn, carrot, half-and-half, milk, nutmeg, pepper and salt.  Simmer over low heat 10 minutes more.
ingredients: 1 (15 ounce) can whole kernel corn, drained
title: Easy Vegetarian Corn Chowder
